overview: Down on her luck, erotica writer Kira takes a job managing the Hollywood hostel. Little did she know that each room here tells a story - each room a different venue for sexual escapades. And Kira just might meet more then she can handle from one mysterious guest who comes to her while she sleeps.
tagline: Actually it's not hostel at all, it's really quite friendly.
title: Any Dorm in a Storm
